content: So now we go to Park's capital allocation strategy or a fancy way of saying, what are we going to do with a lot of that money for those of us that aren't really living in the Wall Street Financial world. So you're going from let's say, North America to Europe, you want to get in a widebody or you get on the XLR, much lower cost for an airline with the XLR. So what I'm saying is that it's really good we did what we did because we are starting now, we will wait a minute, we have a problem with capacity now we'd be in a world of hurt because it will take us three years ago -- approximately 3 years ago, build a factory, get everything designed, let's say, we're starting from the beginning.
